text: "Bright Side of the Road" is a 1979 song by Northern Irish singer Van Morrison. It was taken from his eleventh studio album Into the Music. It went to number 63 in the United Kingdom and number 48 in the Netherlands. It charted outside the top 100 in the United States. It did not chart in Australia or New Zealand. Category:1979 songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:Shakira songs Category:Country rock songs
title: Bright Side of the Road
